name: Chroma.Chroma
Chroma.Colors.Brewer
Chroma.Colors.Virdis
Chroma.Colors.W3CX11

values.name: named
values.comment:
Lookup a colour by name.

    named "red"
    --> Ok rgb255 255 0 0 0

name: Chroma.Interpolator

values.name: interpolate
values.comment:
Return a new colour based on interpolating on two colours and a weighting between them.

CMYK may not work correctly. Will return black if the types are not the same.

name: Chroma.Scale

aliases.name: Data
aliases.comment: Configuration data used by most functions.
aliases.type: { mode : Chroma.Types.Mode, nanColor : Color.Color, spread : Basics.Float, isFixed : Basics.Bool, domainValues : List.Nonempty.Nonempty Basics.Float, pos : List.Nonempty.Nonempty ( Basics.Float, Basics.Float ), paddingValues : List.Nonempty.Nonempty Basics.Float, useClasses : Basics.Bool, colors : List.Nonempty.Nonempty Chroma.Types.ExtColor, useOut : Basics.Bool, min : Basics.Float, max : Basics.Float, useCorrectLightness : Basics.Bool, gammaValue : Basics.Float }

values.name: asRgba
values.comment: Takes a result from getColor and returns Float (0-1) RGB values.

values.name: asRgba255
values.comment: Takes a result from getColor and returns Integer (0-255) RGB values.

values.name: correctLightness
values.comment: Given a data change the lightness value (need to be LAB).

values.name: createData
values.comment: Setup new configuration with the given colours.

values.name: defaultData
values.comment: Sensible default configuration defaults: RGB, domain 0-1, pos 0, 1,and white and black colour range.

values.name: domain
values.comment: Set a new domain like [0,100] rather than the default [0,1]
